body:
It assigns the saved variables to the generated grad_fn. I added a comment.

RE: declarations / options / derivatives. I'm not 100% sure of the relationship. I think it'll change soon and I'd like to come up with more precise names, but I haven't figured it out yet.

I'd like to at least start implementing the NN bindings and then revisit this.
